masteryButtons.classDescription: A former soldier of Rahyeh’s army who left their ranks to pursue a more noble path.
A fallen knight who has taken part of the void inside themselves and uses it to devastate their foes even at the cost of their own life.
passiveBonuses: Your melee attacks, throwing attacks and void spells have a 10% chance to be repeated by an echo 0.5s later (excludes movement abilities and Anomaly).

masteryButtons.classDescription: A bulwark of strength and steel whose mastery of weapons, armor, and the animation of molten metal dominates the battlefield.
passiveBonuses: 3% increased armor for each hit you have taken in the last 10 seconds

masteryButtons.classDescription: You are a righteous warrior, your conviction empowering your allies and burning away the dark with righteous fire.
passiveBonuses: You deal increased fire and physical damage equal to your percent health remaining
1% increased healing effectiveness per point of attunement

nodeList.altText: Each point of vitality grants 10 health and increased health regeneration by 2%.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
Grants [10%] increased health regen per point

Grants [1] vitality per point

Each point of vitality grants 15 void protection, necrotic protection, and poison protection.

nodeList.altText: Each point of strength increases armor by 4%, and improves skills that scale with strength, such as Warpath and Rive.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
Grants [4%] increased armour per point

Grants [1] strength per point

Each point of strength increases armor by 5%, and improves skills that rely on raw strength, such as Warpath and Rive.

nodeList.description: Adds physical damage to your melee attacks and increases their chance to stun.

nodeList.altText: Hits that are blocked deal less damage depending on your block effectiveness and the current area level.
nodeList.description: You have a higher chance to block hits and take less damage from hits that you block.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Adds [1%] block chance and [30] block effectiveness per point.

node.altText: Each point of vitality grants 10 health and increased health regeneration by 2%.
node.nodeDescription:
Grants [10%] increased health regen per point

Grants [1] vitality per point

Each point of vitality grants 15 void protection, necrotic protection, and poison protection.

nodeList.description: Adds armour and reduces the damage you take from nearby enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers)
nodeList.nodeDescription: Grants [10] additional armour per point, and [3%] increased armour per point

Grants [5%] increased damage per point

Grants [15] stun avoidance per point

nodeList.altText: Retribution is a melee attack. Its damage scales with your strength and your modifiers to melee damage. This effect has a 0.2 second cooldown.
nodeList.description: When you are hit you have a chance to counter attack enemies with {Retribution,} a melee physical attack that deals damage to nearby enemies. This effect has a 0.2 second cooldown.
nodeList.nodeDescription: When you take a hit you have a [6%] chance per point to attack enemies around you with Retribution.

node.description: Adds physical damage to your melee attacks and increases their chance to stun.

nodeList.description: Whenever you are hit or whenever you kill an enemy you have a chance to be granted {Iron Mastery} for 5 seconds, a buff that increases your damage and armor.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
You have a 5% chance to gain Iron Mastery for 5 seconds when you kill an enemy or take a hit.

Iron Mastery increases damage and armour by [10%] per point.

node.description: Adds armour and reduces the damage you take from nearby enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers)
node.nodeDescription: Grants [10] additional armour per point, and [3%] increased armour per point

Grants [5%] increased damage per point

Grants [15] stun avoidance per point

stats.statName: Chance To Cast Iron Mastery On Kill Or When Hit

nodeList.description: You have a 25% chance to gain health whenever you block.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Grants a 25% chance to gain [10] health per point on block

node.altText: Hits that are blocked deal less damage depending on your block effectiveness and the current area level.
node.description: You have a higher chance to block hits and take less damage from hits that you block.

nodeList.description: You regain health and mana when you directly use Rive, Vengeance, or Smite.

nodeList.altText: Retribution is a melee attack. Its damage scales with your strength and your modifiers to melee damage. This effect has a 0.2 second cooldown.
nodeList.description: {Retribution} deals increased damage and has additional chance to critically strike.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Retribution has +[25%] critical strike chance per point and [10%] increased damage per point

node.altText: Retribution is a melee attack. Its damage scales with your strength and your modifiers to melee damage. This effect has a 0.2 second cooldown.
node.description: When you are hit you have a chance to counter attack enemies with {Retribution,} a melee physical attack that deals damage to nearby enemies. This effect has a 0.2 second cooldown.
node.nodeDescription: When you take a hit you have a [6%] chance per point to attack enemies around you with Retribution.

node.description: Adds physical damage to your melee attacks and increases their chance to stun.

nodeList.altText: The {Axe's} damage scales with your strength and dexterity and with increases to physical damage and throwing attack damage.
nodeList.description: Whenever you hit an enemy you have a chance to throw an {Axe} at the nearest enemy, dealing physical damage to all enemies in its path. This effect has a 1 second cooldown.
nodeList.nodeDescription: When you hit an enemy you have an [8%] chance per point to throw an axe towards the nearest enemy. You cannot throw more than one axe every second.

stats.statName: Chance To Cast Axe Throw On Hit

nodeList.description: You can dual wield melee weapons by equipping a sword in your off hand. You take more damage while dual wielding (multiplicative with other modifiers).
You deal increased damage while you have a mace or sceptre equipped.
You have increased attack and cast speed while you have a sword or axe equipped.
You deal increased damage if you have killed an enemy recently (last 4 seconds).
nodeList.nodeDescription: [10%] increased damage per point if you have killed an enemy in the past 4 seconds

nodeList.description:
Your spells and attacks deal additional void damage and Smite's base damage is converted to void.

Ignite chance from all sources is converted to slow chance for Smite, and effects from Smite's tree that depend on ignite depend on slow instead.

Smite can no longer provide healing.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
-[15] Armor per point

+[2] melee physical damage per point
Adds [7] health and [15] void protection per point

nodeList.description: You leech a portion of your melee and void damage as health.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
[1.5%] of melee damage leeched as health per point

[1.5%] of void damage leeched as health per point
[7%] increased void damage and [7%] increased physical damage per point

nodeList.description: Every 3 seconds, your next melee attack deals increased damage.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Every 3 seconds you next melee attack deals [30%] increased damage per point

stats.statName: Chance To Absorb Health On Kill

nodeList.altText: Your points in Void Knight are displayed on the buttons to the left.
nodeList.description: Your critical strikes deal more damage for each passive point you have invested in the Void Knight tree.
nodeList.nodeDescription: +1% critical strike multiplier {per point} in Void Knight

stats.statName: Critical Multiplier Per Point Spent In Void Knight

nodeList.description: Whenever you hit an enemy you have a chance to inflict a {Future Attack,} a void attack that hits 2 seconds later and deals 50 void damage.
nodeList.nodeDescription: When you hit an enemy you have a [10%] chance per point to inflict a future attack 2 seconds later that deals 50 void damage

nodeList.altText: Each point of attunement grants 2 mana and improves skills that rely on the innate magic inside you and your surroundings, such as Abyssal Echoes and Erasing Strike.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
Grants [4%] increased damage per point

Grants [1] attunement per point

nodeList.description:
Your melee hits instantly kill enemies that are below a health threshold (a percentage of their maximum health).

If you have a similar effect from an item or passive node, then the highest threshold is used.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Enemies you bring below [3%] health per point with a melee attack are instantly slain

nodeList.description: {Dark Maw} absorbs more health when it triggers.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Dark Maw absorbs an additional [1%] health per point

node.description: Whenever you kill an enemy, you have a chance to absorb 5% of its health.
node.nodeDescription: [5%] chance per point to absorb 5% of an enemy's health on kill

stats.statName: Chance To Absorb Health On Kill

nodeList.altText: {Time Rot} is a debuff that reduces attack and cast speed by 15%, increases stun duration by 25%, and deals void damage over time.
nodeList.description: Whenever you kill an enemy afflicted with {Time Rot,} nearby enemies have a chance to be inflicted with Time Rot.
nodeList.nodeDescription: When you kill an enemy affected by Time Rot, nearby enemies have a [10%] chance per point to be infected with Time Rot.

nodeList.altText: Haste is a non stacking buff that grants 30% increased movement speed.
nodeList.description:
Whenever you use an ability that reduces your mana below 0, you are granted {Haste} for a duration.

This effect has a 10 second cooldown.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
When you use an ability that reduces your mana to less than 0, gain gain Haste for 1 second per point.

This effect has an 10 second cooldown.

nodeList.altText: {Time Rot} is a debuff that reduces attack and cast speed by 15%, increases stun duration by 25%, and deals void damage over time.
nodeList.description: Your melee attacks have a chance to inflict enemies with {Time Rot.}
nodeList.nodeDescription: Melee attacks have a [4%] chance per point to apply Time Rot to enemies hit.

nodeList.altText: Recently refers to the past 4 seconds.

nodeList.altText: Each point of attunement grants 2 mana and improves skills that rely on the innate magic inside you and your surroundings, such as Abyssal Echoes and Erasing Strike.
Movement abilities and {Anomaly} cannot echo.
nodeList.description: Your melee attacks, throwing attacks, and void spells have a higher chance to be echoed 1 second later.
nodeList.nodeDescription: +[2%] chance per point for your melee attacks and void spells to be repeated by an echo 1 second later (excludes movement abilities)

nodeList.description:
You have a chance to gain a {Void Essence} on kill.

Void Essences last 7 seconds and grant 15% increased void damage, 15% increased melee damage, and 10% reduced duration of stuns on you.

You can have a maximum of 3 Void Essences at once.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
You have a [4%] chance per point to gain a void essence on kill.

Void essences last 7 seconds and grant 15% increased void damage, 15% increased melee damage, and 10% reduced duration of stuns on you.

You can have a maximum of 3 void essences at once.

nodeList.description: You have a chance to be granted {Void Aegis} whenever you are hit, granting you 10% reduced damage taken. Void Aegis breaks after you take 100 damage, releasing a void rift dealing damage to nearby enemies.
nodeList.nodeDescription: [5%] chance per point to gain void aegis when hit.\n\nVoid aegis causes you to take 10% less damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but breaks after you take 100 damage, releasing a void rift which damages surrounding enemies.

node.altText: Each point of attunement grants 2 mana and improves skills that rely on the innate magic inside you and your surroundings, such as Abyssal Echoes and Erasing Strike.
Each point of vitality grants 10 health and increased health regeneration by 2%.

nodeList.description:
While you have 3 or more {Void Essences,} if you use a skill that costs at least 40 mana, you consume the void essences to refund the mana cost.

This effect has a 10 second cooldown.
nodeList.nodeDescription:

nodeList.altText: Each point of attunement grants 2 mana and improves skills that rely on the innate magic inside you and your surroundings, such as Manifest Armour and Ring of Shields.

For example, if you have 6 points in the node, giving you 3% increased damage per 1 mana cost, a 10 mana cost melee attack will deal 30% increased damage.

Applies to all damage dealt by the melee attack, not just the melee damage of the initial hit.
nodeList.description: You have increased mana regen and your melee attacks deal increased damage based on their mana cost.
You and your minions have a chance to inflict bleeding and ignite on hit. This bonus is doubled for you if you are using a two handed melee weapon.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Adds [7%] chance per point to inflict bleeding and ignite on hit

stats.statName: Doubled for you with a 2h weapon

nodeList.description: Normally you are in {Anvil Stance}, where you take less damage, but deal less damage. If you use a throwing attack you enter {Hammer Stance} for 4 seconds. In Hammer Stance you deal more damage, but take more damage.

nodeList.description:
You have a chance to be granted a {Divine Essence} when you heal yourself or an ally.

Divine Essences last 10 seconds and grant 10% increased armor and healing effectiveness. They also reduce the duration of stuns on you by 10%.

You can have a maximum of 3 Divine Essences at once.
nodeList.nodeDescription:
You have a [6%] chance per point to gain a divine essence on heal.

Divine essences last 7 seconds and grant 10% increased armour, protections, and healing effectiveness. They also reduce the duration of stuns on you by 10%.

You can have a maximum of 3 divine essences at once.

GeneralTooltop.body: You must have this many points in your Base Class to put points into any Mastery Class. Reaching this point does not unlock your Mastery Classes
